channel.title: Rebuilding the Nintendo DS (not lite)
channel.description: I have been trying to find a guide on to properly rebuild the nintendo DS, because now both screens do not work, this is the farthest I got in google "how to rebuild a nintendo ds -emulators -ps2 -gaming -animal -game -buy" this is not the lite version, and looks way different inside, please help, I have been trying for a few days now, but my DS has a nice golden skin though.

item.title: Rebuilding the Nintendo DS (not lite)
item.dc:creator: @xxpk3r1 xxpk3r1
item.description:
@xxpk3r1 wrote:

i got a pink ds (not lite) (my sisters)

Read full topic

item.title: Rebuilding the Nintendo DS (not lite)
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I did put everything back where it was, I even made sure by taking a before picture. However, it seems that two plugs never want to go that extra .5 millimeter into the socket, I will get a pic soon. I did it with my SP, and it works perfectly, even better, the L button doesn’t have lint behind it now

Read full topic

item.title: Rebuilding the Nintendo DS (not lite)
item.dc:creator: @hodunken hodunken
item.description:
@hodunken wrote:

I had this same problem with my SP. the concept is similar… once you open up your ds just follow the wires and remeber what everything looks like…clip the wires that are conected to the screen…get a new screen… twist the wires back onto the screen and whola!!! its way simple…tell me how is goes

Read full topic
